# Library Packages
```{r}
packages = c('raster', 'sf', 
             'tmap', 'clock', 
             'tidyverse','ggplot2','ggraph','lubridate')
for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p,character.only = T)
}
```
